title: Fully remodeled 2 Bed/1 Bath, Bright and Spacious, Central Location
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.

Fully remodeled 2 Bed/1 Bath, Bright and Spacious, Central Location, $2,095.00

New Special Offer: $1,500 Cash Bonus At Move In!

Dogs & Cats Ok with Additional Deposit
Great location, walking distance to Lake Merritt, Piedmont Ave, Grand Lake, grocery, shopping, and dining.
This unit is located on the third floor of a three story, 12 unit building.
Brand new LVT & condo quality carpeting
